prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a middle-aged non-binary person with dark brown skin, curly hair, showing a clear disgust facial expression (nose wrinkled), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, softbox lighting, high dynamic range, 8k master
